entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this evening. Rain mixed with drizzle overnight. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High 12.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 70%
